Title: Tall Men with Feelings
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Lauren Morelli, Piper Kerman (book)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Laura Prepon, Michael Harney, Michelle Hurst
Plot: Grief looms over the prison as the inmates mourn a recent suicide. Dayanara, Nicky, and Red plot to end Mendez's career by tricking him into revealing his indiscretions. Larry gives a radio...
